review: Easy way to convert your flat screen TV for Internet viewing/streaming of Netflix & Prime & music.  (Of course, first you will need a subscription for Netflix if you want to Netflix, and need to be a PRIME member if you want Prime, etc...)  I'm not the least bit a 'tekkie' but this was super easy to set up!  You must have wireless in your home to do it, then simply follow the easy set-up instructions that come with the Fire Stick.  One thing that separates this from other similar devices like Roku (besides the easier setup) is that it has a very handy little remote control to use (rather than using your smartphone or tablet) to scroll through movie/prime options plus you can view your Amazon PRIME movies too.
author: RebeccaJean

review: Amazon has done right with this one. If you utilize Amazon Music + Prime then this stick is great. The 'Remote Control' app for Android could use some work, but the control it comes with works great. It also allows you to watch Netflix and Hulu on here. Very performant, allows for Close Captioning, and just works.  Since I've had this, I have barely turned on my other 'go to' streaming devices. Good job Amazon.
